quote_last: , during a lull, Mr Yoshogi told me that owing to the war there were now many more women in England than men.
title: Pig and Pepper: A Comedy of Youth
author: David Footman

quote_first: At the thought he jumped to his feet and took down from its hook the coat in which he had left Miss Viner's letter. The clock marked the
quote_last: , and he knew it would make no difference if he went down to the post-box now or early the next morning; but he wanted to clear his conscience, and having found the letter he went to the door.
title: The Reef
author: Edith Wharton
